original_text: Then I lifted up mine eyes, and saw, and, behold, there stood before the river a ram which had two horns: and the two horns were high; but one was higher than the other, and the higher came up last.
korean_text: 내가 눈을 들어 본즉 강 가에 두 뿔 가진 숫양이 섰는데 그 두 뿔이 다 길었으며 그 중 한 뿔은 다른 뿔보다 길었고 그 긴 것은 나중에 난 것이더라

sentences.original_text: Then I lifted up mine eyes
there stood before the river a ram

sentences.korean_translation: 그 숫양에게는 두 개의 뿔이 있었으며

sentences.original_text: and the two horns were high
but one was higher than the other
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 하나가 다른 하나보다 더 컸고

sentences.original_text: and the higher came up last
